name: Experiment_on_Single_Orbit
title: Experiment on Single Orbit Tasking Duration Minimisation
excerpt: This study explores whether a single-orbit satellite constellation can complete tasks fast enough for real-time applications. At first glance, a single orbit sounds simple and elegantâ€”so we tested if it could actually work.

name: Minimum_Constellation_Size_for_Polar_LEO_Global_Coverage
title: How many satellites and how much time are needed for full global coverage?
